input_args.passage: 'Georges-Henri Bousquet - Wikipedia | Georges-Henri Bousquet (21 June 1900, Meudon – 23 January 1978, Latresne) was a 20th-century French jurist, economist and Islamologist. He was a professor of law at the Faculty of Law of the University of Algiers where he was a specialist in the sociology of North Africa (Berbers, Islam)., 20th-century French jurist, economist and Islamologist\nGeorges-Henri Bousquet | French jurist and Islamic studies scholar.'
input_args.claim: 'From both sources and, we can understand that Georges-Henri Bousquet was a French jurist, economist, and Islamologist.'
